infos.value: I-I did it!
Contain yourself. You are the elder prince of Leonis.
...Right.
Let us press onward.
Phew...
Excellent work, Lord Mont. Your command in battle was admirable.
I'd beg to differ...
You shouldn't be so quick to make light of your abilities, my lord.
B-but...
I'm saying that you ought to be more sure of yourself.
More...sure of myself?
No one doubts that you're growing stronger. Other than you, that is.
Your abilities are unrivaled.
Unrivaled? Save that kind of talk for Sterne.
You may not look alike, but there's no mistaking you're twins all the same.
You're like two peas in a pod.
Sterne and I...two peas in a pod!? That's ridiculous...
Hah! Have I ever been one for falsehoods or flattery?
Well, no...
But no one has ever said that he and I are alike.
I've always wanted to be as strong as Sterne so that I can be of use to Father...
And you will be, Lord Mont. I guarantee it!
Why the delay? We make haste!
R-right!
Let's get going.
